title: Pygmalion / C.R.I.S.T.A.L.L.
description: An accounting-and-learning innovative NOD platform of the 7th technological wave (progressive Noonomics). The startup is focused on the realization, recognition, and flourishing of non-material human value: participation, trust, gratitude, and conscious contribution — beyond money, coercion, and KPI logic.
idea_body: Modern systems can measure price but fail to recognize value. Pygmalion creates an environment where contribution does not turn into obligation, gratitude does not become debt, and value is not reduced to money or cost.
audience_body: Researchers, developers, practitioners, systems thinkers, philanthropists, and anyone working with human contribution beyond economic incentives.
core_body: TIUP (Human-Centered Navigation Technology) helps people see the consequences of their actions while preserving freedom of choice, responsibility, and human dignity.
status_body: Online and offline MVPs have been created. The startup is in an open research and applied development stage.

cta_manifesto.mvp_description: This is a demonstration version of the platform confirming the viability of principles for accounting non-material human contribution.
